lexUnit.name: execute.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: carry out a sentence of death on (a condemned person).

sentence.text: People were very angry when Admiral Byng failed to attack the French at Minorca , and the decision to execute him for cowardice was exactly what the public wanted .
